Khonkolor/Nighstrike::

"Wait me, Wait me !!!"said Khonkolor while he transformed to beast 
mode and ran behind Epyon "I'm hurted and I don't know if I can run 
so fast..."

Nightstrike continue uncounceus, but he dreamt again some part of his 
past as Condor but the program that Megatron has instaled inside him, 
took the control again.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod/Epyon::
> 
> "Ok, there is nothing more to do here. Let's go," said Epyon.
> Hot Rod transformed to car mode, and Epyon placed Nightstrike 
within Hot
> Rod. Epyon then transformed to dragon mode. They started to make 
their
> way out of the arena.
